# Basic validation of a regression model

```{r}
library(car)
model <- lm(prestige~education + women + income, data = Prestige)
au <- auditor(model)
au
```

```{r}
plot(au, variable = "income")
```



# Influence measures

## Cooks distance

```{r}
plot_cooks_dist(au)
```

# Multicollinearity of variables

## VIF - Variance inflation factor

```{r}
plot_vif(au)
```
